biotools.summary: Tool to analyze conserved hydrophobic contacts (CHC) from multiple structural alignments. In addition to a multiple sequence alignment, a structural alignment which provides the superposition of structurally conserved regions (SCRs) (i.e., results from SCR_FIND) needs to be provided.

bioschemas.name: CHC_FIND
bioschemas.summary: Tool to analyze conserved hydrophobic contacts (CHC) from multiple structural alignments. In addition to a multiple sequence alignment, a structural alignment which provides the superposition of structurally conserved regions (SCRs) (i.e., results from SCR_FIND) needs to be provided.
